type accountResponse = Array<{| id: Number {"typeId": "int"}, name: String, "type": String, address: String, airMiles: Number {"typeId": "int"}, creationDate: String|}> {"example": "[{\\\"id\\\":1,\\\"name\\\":\\\"ACME\\\",\\\"type\\\":\\\"business\\\",\\\"address\\\":\\\"\\\\\\\"1 Main St,Los Angeles,CA,92000,USA\\\\\\\"\\\",\\\"airMiles\\\":5000,\\\"creationDate\\\":\\\"2020-09-21T12:00:00Z\\\"},{\\\"id\\\":2,\\\"name\\\":\\\"Jane Doe\\\",\\\"type\\\":\\\"personal\\\",\\\"address\\\":\\\"\\\\\\\"1 Main St,Los Angeles,CA,92000,USA\\\\\\\"\\\",\\\"airMiles\\\":50000,\\\"creationDate\\\":\\\"2010-01-01T00:00:00Z\\\"}]"}
